articles.content: Borussia Dortmund scored three times in the second half with two goals from Erling Haaland and one from Jadon Sancho, to beat hosts RB Leipzig 3-1 on Saturday and close the gap to the top spots in th… [+1710 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Study finds AFL players with concussion likely returning to play with damaged brain cells - ABC News
articles.description: A five-year study finds AFL players are likely returning to play from concussion with high levels of damaged brain cells, putting them at risk of long-term harm, even though they might feel fine.
articles.content: A five-year study has found AFL players are likely returning to play from concussion with high levels of damaged brain cells, putting them at risk of long-term harm, even though they might feel fine.… [+5088 chars]
